title: Projects & Ventures
description: Portfolio of projects, ventures, and initiatives

projects.name: Since AI
projects.tagline: Northern Europe's premier AI innovation platform and hackathon
projects.description: Northern Europe's premier AI innovation platform and hackathon
projects.longDescription: Since AI is an innovative AI hackathon and innovation platform positioning itself as Northern Europe's premier destination for AI advancement. Through strategic partnerships with global technology leaders and cutting-edge program design, Since AI drives community engagement and practical AI innovation across the Nordic region.
highlights: Northern Europe's premier AI innovation platform
Strategic partnerships with global technology leaders

projects.name: Root
projects.tagline: Nordic region's premier innovative recruiting event
projects.description: Nordic region's premier innovative recruiting event
projects.longDescription: Root is the Nordic region's premier innovative recruiting event connecting top talent with Europe's leading technology companies. With strategic relationships across Nordic's biggest IT companies and Europe's most influential IT career speakers, Root creates unprecedented networking opportunities for 1000+ participants.

projects.name: Kolt
projects.tagline: Automation solutions for complex operational challenges
projects.description: Automation solutions for complex operational challenges
projects.longDescription: Kolt develops innovative automation solutions addressing complex operational challenges through advanced technology integration. Building robust platforms designed for mission-critical applications with autonomous operation, real-time data processing, and seamless remote management capabilities.

projects.name: Attractor
projects.tagline: Technology consultancy building production-grade software and AI systems
projects.description: Technology consultancy building production-grade software and AI systems
projects.longDescription: Attractor is a technology consultancy building production-grade software, applied AI, and security-first systems. Operating at the intersection of commercial execution and technical delivery, helping teams turn unclear goals into shipped outcomes through practical AI integration and solution architecture.
